item.title: DangerZone [508] 508 cache, Fullscreen HD client, and LD Client DL's included
item.dc:creator: @tyler28852 tyler28852
item.description:
@tyler28852 wrote:

[quote=“Xdivinex, post:1, topic:374795”]THIS IS A 508 NOT A 508/525 OR z508!

Another thing, this release is a release of DuhPk’s Drowning508 Beta version. This release is totally his server with a few major bugs fixed by me. There are still MANY bugs/glitches that need to be fixed by YOU, there is no anti leech if you compile there should be no errors but I warn you this contains many bugs and is not suitable to be hosted as an actual server as soon as the download is complete.This is Pali based and needs some work by someone who knows what they are doing. This server could be a great tool for learning purposes, this is why I have made these fixes so newer members may have a fighting chance at making and hosting a great server. The pictures below are all DuhPk’s and then new ones that will be added by me in a few minutes.

In know way do I take credit for this server. This is totally DuhPk’s I just fixed some major bugs.

A lot of the features were here but I went through and organized some of the code so it is actually understandable… It was a complete mess in most places… This server still needs a ton of work so if you choose to leech and host as it is, you fail… There are still major glitches in here… I’m only re-releasing this with a few updates of mine so it will actually run and stay functional. I found this to be a great tool… I am currently working on v2 which will use EventManager a lot more… This version has it but i am not running barely anything through it… V2 will be a complete change for the better…=)

It has many features I do not want to list them all so just look @ the pictures. I will only list my new updates…

Updates:
Added EventManager
Cleaned up source(Still needs lot of WORK!)
Added new npc spawns
Fixed Shops they now work 100%
Before only two of them worked…
Added new Interfaces for Mage Bank
Now all webs and levers work 100%
Changed all teleport Gfx’s to new green teleport…
Added new working teleport objects
Fixed Login Glitch
Fixed character looks…
Only works correctly on HD Version in LD Hair will look pink and can’t change colors
Added new Quest interfaces with working teleports

Features That came with it I just cleaned up some code…
100% player v. player combat
100% Barrage Autocast
100% Fight Pits
100% Castle Wars
100% Bounty Hunter
90% All Specials
100% Dueling
95% Grand Exchange- Close to perfection all interfaces work…
99.99% GodWars (Don’t believe in perfection here)
100% Clan Chat
Shantay Pass in construction 50-60%
100% Mining
100% Fishing
100% Woodcutting
All skills at 100% or near besides
Construction- 10%
Summoning-base added
Hunter-base + a little more

More to come on Next Release=)
Check it out to see…

[size=14pt]MY NEW IMAGES:[/size]



x3x0s7.jpg764×503


2q9mlpz.jpg765×503

Spawns are commented out in autospawn.cfg Commented out to take the pic. All of them are agressive NPC’s and very strong… All dragons are also 100% animated no glitches

More Pictures:





































aeny53.png763×503









2ev475u.png1279×737


2vkl3lk.png764×500

2i6jwcp.png766×503










Download Links:
Source:
http://www.mediafire.com/?8rcfpw18omz4fiz
Client:
http://www.mediafire.com/?yynhtdmt3d3

Downloads
[10]
[100]
[500]
[1000]
[2000]
[5000][/quote]

nice!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Xdivinex Xdivinex
item.description:
@Xdivinex wrote:

thanks drub atleast you took the time to look… There a quite a few changes in game that these noobs aren’t even checking they are just saying i leeched… I actually made the shops work… They were screwed up… im running server messages through EventManager… Drowning’s source didn’t even have EventManager… I added it. i Changed quite a few things and everyone says i leeched…

Read full topic

item.title: DangerZone [508] 508 cache, Fullscreen HD client, and LD Client DL's included
item.dc:creator: @Xdivinex Xdivinex
item.description:
@Xdivinex wrote:

I said right in my post the pics are his… Why post new pics when its the same base… I said this is drownings i just fixed some of the major bugs so all you guys need to chill out… Im just trying to help some people who couldn’t figure out the problems when DuhPk released it… So i guess if you guys wanna Rep – me for trying to help the community you need to move on… I stated clearly in my post that this is Drowning508… I just fixed the major Bugs…

If people would actually read at the top they would see i have stated this is Duhpk’s and i will be using his pictures taking no credit… But no, Everyone is to busy looking to call each other leechers. I can see why people don’t like to post there work here. Nobody can post anything here without being called a leecher in some way…

Read full topic
